Bevel Download Manager browser integration.

This is the official Google Chrome extension from the developers of Bevel Download Manager. Bevel Download Manager is a free, open-source, and cross-platform software that significantly improves the download experience. This extension enables the Bevel DM desktop app to integrate with your browser. Easily send links to Bevel DM for quick and reliable downloads.

Source code repository for this extension: https://github.com/tariibaba/beveldm-browser

Bevel Download Manager desktop app source code repository: https://github.com/tariibaba/beveldm
